name: Valley National Bancorp
description: Valley National Bancorp is a regional bank holding company headquartered in Wayne, New Jersey. Established in 1927, the bank has grown significantly through a series of strategic acquisitions and expansions, positioning itself as a key player in the financial services sector. Valley National Bank, the primary subsidiary, offers a wide range of banking products and services including personal banking, commercial banking, and wealth management solutions. The bank is committed to providing exceptional customer service and maintaining strong relationships within the communities it serves. Valley's product offerings include checking and savings accounts, loans, mortgages, and investment services tailored to meet the needs of individuals and businesses alike. With a focus on innovation, Valley National Bancorp has embraced technology to enhance customer experiences, offering online and mobile banking platforms for convenient access to banking services. The company is also dedicated to supporting local initiatives and economic development, contributing to the growth and sustainability of the regions it operates in. As a publicly traded company on the NASDAQ, Valley National Bancorp continues to strive for growth and profitability while adhering to high standards of corporate governance and social responsibility.

seo.meta_title: Valley National Bancorp | Your Trusted Banking Partner
seo.meta_description: Discover Valley National Bancorp, a regional bank dedicated to providing personal and commercial banking solutions. Explore our services, community involvement, and commitment to customer satisfaction.

faq.question: What services does Valley National Bank offer?
faq.answer: Valley National Bank offers personal banking, commercial banking, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Valley National Bancorp?
faq.answer: Ira Robbins is the CEO of Valley National Bancorp.

faq.question: Where is Valley National Bank headquartered?
faq.answer: Valley National Bank is headquartered in Wayne, New Jersey, USA.

faq.question: When was Valley National Bancorp founded?
faq.answer: Valley National Bancorp was founded in 1927.
